page.title: 04Coombe housing survey.
page.content: The advantages are:quiet, rural life and people like the climate. In order to catch a bus the people must go to Camborne, which is 2_3 miles away. Most households have their own car. The nearest post box is in Coombe. The nearest post office is in Tehidy Road, Camborne. The average amount of years people have lived in the area is 16 years. The average number of rooms is 7. Jobs people do are:working on the farm, local government officer, most people living in this area are retired. The average amount of people living in one house is 3.
